Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide unparalleled performance and satisfaction. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. I kindly propose a price of $12000 for this product. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our top-quality offering. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
